title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point:

  • One point is earned for identifying the market as an oligopoly because there is mutual interdependence—the behavior of each firm affects the other.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point:

  • One point is earned for stating that Winward’s dominant strategy is a morning departure.
descriptions:
Student receives 0/1 point(s)

1 point:

Student receives 1/1 point(s)

1 point:

  • One point is earned for stating that Winward’s dominant strategy is a morning departure.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
2 points:

  • One point is earned for stating that choosing an evening departure is not a dominant strategy for Airtouch.

  • One point is earned for correctly reasoning that Airtouch does not have a dominant strategy because its best payoff depends on Winward’s choice (OR, more specifically, if Windward chooses a morning departure, Airtouch is best off choosing a morning departure).
descriptions:
